LanguageData.SlaveSuppressionOffset.label: slave suppression offset
LanguageData.SlaveSuppressionOffset.description: An offset applied to the wearer's slave suppression. Higher values suppress slaves longer, while lower values make slaves rebel more often.
LanguageData.TerrorSource.label: terror
LanguageData.TerrorSource.description: The intensity of terror this object induces when viewed.
LanguageData.BiosculpterPodSpeedFactor.label: biosculpter pod speed factor
LanguageData.BiosculpterPodSpeedFactor.description: A multiplier on the speed of a biosculpter pod. This is affected by the cleanliness of the room - a cleaner room will result in a quicker biosculpting cycle.
LanguageData.StyleDominance.label: style dominance
LanguageData.StyleDominance.description: How much this object contributes to overall style dominance in an area.
LanguageData.Terror.label: terror
LanguageData.Terror.description: The intensity of terror this person is experiencing.
LanguageData.ConversionPower.label: conversion power
LanguageData.ConversionPower.description: How effective this person is at converting others to their own ideoligion. When this person attempts to convert someone else, this value multiplies the amount of certainty the other person loses.
LanguageData.CertaintyLossFactor.label: global certainty loss factor
LanguageData.CertaintyLossFactor.description: A multiplier on how much certainty this person loses when someone else tries to convert them away from their ideoligion.
LanguageData.SocialIdeoSpreadFrequencyFactor.label: ideoligion spread chance
LanguageData.SocialIdeoSpreadFrequencyFactor.descript: A multiplier on the chance that this person will try to convert other people to their own ideoligion.
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyOutdoorsDarkOffset.label: shooting accuracy outdoors dark
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyOutdoorsDarkOffset.descr: An offset on shooting accuracy if the target is outdoors at night.
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyOutdoorsLitOffset.label: shooting accuracy outdoors lit
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyOutdoorsLitOffset.descri: An offset on shooting accuracy if the target is outdoors during the day.
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyIndoorsDarkOffset.label: shooting accuracy indoors dark
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyIndoorsDarkOffset.descri: An offset on shooting accuracy if the target is indoors in the dark.
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyIndoorsLitOffset.label: shooting accuracy indoors lit
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyIndoorsLitOffset.descrip: An offset on shooting accuracy if the target is indoors and lit.
LanguageData.MeleeHitChanceOutdoorsDarkOffset.label: melee hit chance outdoors dark
LanguageData.MeleeHitChanceOutdoorsDarkOffset.descrip: An offset on melee hit chance if the target is outdoors at night.
LanguageData.MeleeHitChanceOutdoorsLitOffset.label: melee hit chance outdoors lit
LanguageData.MeleeHitChanceOutdoorsLitOffset.descript: An offset on melee hit chance if the target is outdoors during the day.
LanguageData.MeleeHitChanceIndoorsDarkOffset.label: melee hit chance indoors dark
LanguageData.MeleeHitChanceIndoorsDarkOffset.descript: An offset on melee hit chance if the target is indoors in the dark.
LanguageData.MeleeHitChanceIndoorsLitOffset.label: melee hit chance indoors lit
LanguageData.MeleeHitChanceIndoorsLitOffset.descripti: An offset on melee hit chance if the target is indoors and lit.
LanguageData.MeleeDodgeChanceOutdoorsDarkOffset.label: melee dodge chance outdoors night
LanguageData.MeleeDodgeChanceOutdoorsDarkOffset.descr: An offset on melee dodge chance if the target is outdoors at night.
LanguageData.MeleeDodgeChanceOutdoorsLitOffset.label: melee dodge chance outdoors day
LanguageData.MeleeDodgeChanceOutdoorsLitOffset.descri: An offset on melee dodge chance if the target is outdoors during the day.
LanguageData.MeleeDodgeChanceIndoorsDarkOffset.label: melee dodge chance indoors dark
LanguageData.MeleeDodgeChanceIndoorsDarkOffset.descri: An offset on melee dodge chance if the target is indoors in the dark.
LanguageData.MeleeDodgeChanceIndoorsLitOffset.label: melee dodge chance indoors lit
LanguageData.MeleeDodgeChanceIndoorsLitOffset.descrip: An offset on melee dodge chance if the target is indoors and lit.
LanguageData.BiosculpterOccupantSpeed.label: biosculpter occupant speed
LanguageData.BiosculpterOccupantSpeed.description: A multiplier on how quickly this person will complete a biosculpter pod cycle.
LanguageData.SlaveSuppressionFallRate.label: slave suppression fall rate
LanguageData.SlaveSuppressionFallRate.description: The rate at which slave suppression falls.
LanguageData.AnimalProductsSellImprovement.label: animal products price improvement
LanguageData.AnimalProductsSellImprovement.descriptio: When this person sells meat, leather, or wool, prices are improved by this percentage.
LanguageData.SuppressionPower.label: suppression power
LanguageData.SuppressionPower.description: A multiplier on a warden's ability to suppress slaves.
LanguageData.HackingSpeed.label: hacking speed
LanguageData.HackingSpeed.description: How fast this person can hack into computer terminals.
LanguageData.PruningSpeed.label: pruning speed
LanguageData.PruningSpeed.description: A multiplier on how fast this person can prune a Gauranlen tree to maintain their connection with it.\n\nPruning is more of a contemplative psychic task than a physical one, so health factors like vision are unimportant here.
